response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit and add significant value to your endeavors. Given its immense worth of $1,200,000 to you, I am offering it to you at an exceptional price of $1,150,000. This offer represents a remarkable opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a competitive rate.

Please consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you through the entire process.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
